appDesc.message: A browser extension to perform automated bids for eBay items, also when you are away from your computer

cs_autobidDeactivatedBeforeBid.message: Global Auto-Bid was deactivated short before the bid confirmation

cs_autobidGroupDeactivatedBeforeBid.message: Group Auto-Bid was deactivated short before the bid confirmation

cs_autobidInactiveForArticle.message: Auto-bid is inactive for this item

cs_bidFinished.message: Bid process has been completed $1ms before the auction ended

cs_biddingFailed.message: Auction not successful. Your bid was not received or accepted by eBay (e.g. when another bidder placed a higher bid before yours.)

cs_biddingOverbid.message: Auction was not successful. You were overbid.

cs_biddingStatusUnknown.message: Final auction end state is still unknown.

cs_bomAutoBidHint.message: Please ensure group and global auto-bid are also enabled.

cs_errorCannotFindBidButton.message: Can not find the bid button on the item page!

cs_errorCannotFindConfirmButton.message: Element #confirm_body could not be found in the item page

cs_errorCannotFindModal.message: Element #MODAL_BODY could not be found in the item page

cs_testBidFinished.message: Test bid process (till confirmation) has been completed $1ms before the auction ended

generic_group_autoBidHint.message: Configures the Auto-Bid mode for the group

generic_group_bidAllHint.message: Toggles between 'Bid until you win' and 'Bid all items from this group'

popup_addWatchListItemsFailed.message: Error while adding items from watchlist: $1

popup_adjustedBidtime.message: Adjusted bid-time by $1s due to risk of colliding with item $2

popup_articleAuctionEndsVerySoon.message: Item auction ends in less then a minute

popup_articleRemove.message: Removes all events and configuration for this item

popup_offerTabOpenedForBidding.message: Offer tab has been opened for bidding (tab=$1)

popup_autoBidDeactivated1.message: Auto-Bid deactivated. It was activated in another

popup_autoBidDeactivatedForGroup.message: Auto-Bid for group $1 has been deactivated.

popup_bidCollision.message: Bidding aborted because it collided with another article: $1

popup_ebayLoginRequired.message: Failed to retrieve $1 watch list. Please ensure you are logged in.

popup_openArticleInTab.message: Opens the item in a new tab

popup_storageUsedFailed.message: Error checking how much space is used in browser.storage.sync area: $1

popup_storageUsedInfo.message: Memory consumption in browser.storage.sync area is $1%

popup_timeDiff1.message: The time difference of your system to the ebay time is too large (~$1s). Please ensure your clock is precise to ensure reliable automatic bidding is possible.

popup_updateStorageFailed.message: Failed to update browser storage for item $1: $2
